name: Volgarr the Viking
blurb: Hardcore 16-bit style action from the golden era of arcade games, reimagined for today!

rewards.reward: No Reward
"THANK YOU!":  At this level we will send you some slick Volgarr-related wallpapers for your desktop and access to occasional backer-only updates!
"THE GAME":  Receive a digital copy of Volgarr the Viking + the THANK YOU tier rewards!
"EARLY BACKER SOUNDTRACK SPECIAL:" Digital DRM-free version of orchestral soundtrack + exclusive heavy metal version of the game's theme covered by the band "Mj\u00f6lknir" + THE GAME tier rewards!
"DOUBLE PACK":  2 digital copies of Volgarr the Viking + the THANK YOU tier rewards!
"ART BOOK":  Digital Art Book and Behind the Scenes Videos + THE GAME tier rewards!
"EPIC SOUNDTRACK":  Digital DRM-free version of orchestral soundtrack + exclusive heavy metal version of the game's theme covered by the band "Mj\u00f6lknir" + the ART BOOK tier rewards!
"TESTER": Beta Tester Spot and credited in the game as a tester!  Early access to the game and ability to give direct feedback on its progress!  Also includes the EPIC SOUNDTRACK tier rewards!
"FULL PACKAGE": Special Thanks credit (can still choose to be credited as a Tester instead if preferred), everything in the TESTER reward tier, and a bonus digital copy of the game (2 total).
"POSTER PACK": 18"x24" Wall Poster of Volgarr the Viking!  Also includes the FULL PACKAGE tier rewards!  **Please add $20 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"SPECIAL EDITION": Volgarr the Viking in a special DVD case exclusively available from Kickstarter, a digital copy of the game manual, and everything in the FULL PACKAGE tier rewards on the disc (2 total copies of the game, 1 digital you'll recieve immediately and 1 shipped on the DVD). **Please add $25 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**
"SPECIAL POSTER PACK": Everything in the SPECIAL EDITION tier + the 18"x24" Wall Poster!  **Please add $30 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"COLLECTOR'S EDITION": Spoof box with dummy game cartridge, a hard copy of the manual, custom USB drive containing the game and all of the FULL PACKAGE tier rewards (2 total copies of the game, 1 digital you'll recieve immediately and 1 shipped on the USB drive).  **Please add $25 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**
"COLLECTOR'S POSTER PACK": Everything in the COLLECTOR'S EDITION tier + the 18"x24" Wall Poster!  **Please add $30 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"ILLUSTRATION": 11x17 Original, completely unique Ink Illustration of Volgarr by Kris Durrschmidt and the FULL PACKAGE tier rewards. **Please add $25 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"COLLECTOR'S ILLUSTRATION": 11x17 Original, completely unique Ink Illustration of Volgarr by Kris Durrschmidt and the COLLECTOR'S POSTER PACK tier rewards. **Please add $35 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"FOR ALL TIME": ALL future games by Crazy Viking Studios!  Your name will also be listed before others in the Special Thanks section and in a different color!  Also includes the FULL PACKAGE tier rewards PLUS 2 bonus digital copies of the game (4 total).

"MEGA PACK": Combination of the FOR ALL TIME, SPECIAL EDITION, and POSTER PACK tiers (4 total copies of the game, 3 digital, 1 on the DVD, and only 1 copy of everything in the FULL PACKAGE tier, included on the DVD).   **Please add $30 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"COLLECTOR'S MEGA PACK": Combination of the FOR ALL TIME, COLLECTOR'S EDITION, and POSTER PACK tiers (4 total copies of the game, 3 digital, 1 on the USB drive, and only 1 copy of everything in the FULL PACKAGE tier, included on the USB drive).   **Please add $30 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"WE LOVE YOU PACK":  A customized video of Volgarr singing about his love specifically for you, by name in probably the most strangely violent love song ever written about... aw hell, Volgarr will probably go off on a face stabbing rant at some point (Kris doing his Viking barbarian voice over animated Volgarr).  Also includes everything in the COLLECTOR'S MEGA PACK tier!   **Please add $30 for shipping outside of the USA, Canada and Mexico**

"ULTIMATE ARCADE":  Your very own Volgarr the Viking Arcade Machine for the ULTIMATE game purist experience! Complete with custom Volgarr side art, Marquee that lights up and X-Arcade Joystick. Lovingly constructed with our very own hands with superior [Rec Room Master] parts, shipped assembled** and Signed by the team. Arcade machine includes a PC (preinstalled with Volgarr the Viking game, digital sound track and art book), monitor and speakers so you can just hook it all up and play! Your name will be listed in the credits as an "Executive Producer".  Also includes everything in the FULL PACKAGE tier.  THIS REWARD IS ONLY AVAILABLE TO BACKERS IN THE 48 STATES OF THE USA. **Computer, monitor, speakers and X-Arcade Tank Stick are not preassembled in the machine.
